name: Chill-Zone
description: This is a hobby project where I used some Blender Kit Assets and created some of my own models like the fireplace to create a cosy chill zone.

name: BLACK CARDS| Neon Edition
description: Black Cards is a student project where the task was to design a poster for an imaginary product. The focus was on the 3D rendering. On top, I designed the card textures in Illustrator. For the first time, I worked with Redshift in Cinema 4D on this project.

name: Sunrise Apartment
description: I created for a student project in 3D class an entire apartment in Unreal and Blender in 2 weeks. It runs in real-time and users can walk around in first-person mode. It's also optimized for VR. All 3 D assets, pictures on the wall, Materials and Blueprint parts are created by me.Only the textures, except for the books on the shelf and the pictures on the wall, are from the Quixel Megascan Library.I photographed the other textures myself. The music of the video is also created by me on a loopstation wink

name: VR Dream Room
description: I created my dream room as a hobby project to get more familiar with Unreal Engine. Here I created all the 3D assets, light setup and programming work myself using blueprints. The project took about 3 weeks and ended on 30.06.2019.

name: Bonscheladen Flexible CD
description: This is a student project for Corporate Design. The goal is to create a flexible design system. Here I have chosen the brand Bonscheladen, which produces handmade candies. https://www.bonscheladen.de/ For this, I created 3 D renders of their candies and combined them with my newly designed logo.In addition, I also created a whole design system. You can find the style guide PDF here: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fKSRTjAh7095nk7tnuHr5XWIUzHuQJFu/view?usp=share_link

name: Dynamic Machines Challange Submission
description: This was my submission for the dynamic maschines challange from @pwnisher. Everything is modelled, textured, animated, shaded by me and sounds + piano in background are created and played by me

name: RetroBoy
description: As a study project in the subject screen design we had the task to design a new product which you can customize in a configurator according to your wishes. I designed the brand Retro Boy, which offers a portable and customizable game console, on which all retro classics can be played without any problems.I was inspired by the design of the Gameboy Classic and designed and modernized it completely in 3 D. In addition, I created the whole web design in Adobe XD which is interactive.
